text: Copernicus () is a 1973 Polish historical movie directed by Ewa Petelska and Czesław Petelski and starring Andrzej Kopiczyński, Barbara Wrzesińska, Czesław Wołłejko, Andrzej Antkowiak, Klaus-Peter Thiele. == Other websites == * Category:1973 movies Category:1970s biographical movies Category:1970s historical movies Category:Polish biographical movies Category:Movies directed by Ewa Petelska Category:Movies directed by Czesław Petelski
title: Copernicus (movie)
